high_descs: Go to the computer desk on the right
Pick up the white mug From the desk
Take a couple steps to the right, face the desk
Put the white mug on the top shelf of the desk
Pick up the pen From the shelf
Put the pen inside the white mug
anns.task_desc: Put the pen inside the mug on top of the desk

high_descs: Turn right and walk to the desk.
Pick up the mug which is on the desk to the left of the laptop.
Walk slightly to the right and face the desk.
Put the mug on top of the CD which is on the top shelf of the desk.
Pick up the pen which is on the top shelf of the desk to the left of the credit card.
Put the pen in the mug.
anns.task_desc: Put a mug with a pen inside it on the top shelf of a desk on top of a CD.

high_descs: Move to your right so you are facing the furthest left of the desk
Pick up a mug off of the desk
Move to your right and then face left right away
Set the mug down on the shelf of the desk
Pick up a pen off of the desk
Set a pen down inside of the mug
anns.task_desc: Move a mug and place a pen in it
